snippet: Leadership vacuums in government and the Vatican have further shaken Italians troubled by recession, political instability and church scandals.
abstract: Leadership vacuums in Italy's government and Vatican have further shaken Italians already troubled by recession, political instability and church scandals.

byline.contributor: Gaia Pianigiani and Daniel J. Wakin contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Leadership vacuums in government and the Vatican have further shaken Italians troubled by recession, political instability and church scandals.

headline.seo: Italy Uneasy Over Vacuum in Vatican and Government
headline.main: Italy Uneasy as Government and Vatican Drift, Rudderless
headline.print_headline: Italy Is Uneasy as Government And Vatican Drift, Rudderless
